name: Pokémon Dumb 3
description:
Pokémon Dumb 3 is the third and most likely the final installment in the Pokémon Dumb Series. The game might include some minor updates containing bug fixes and maybe a little bit of new content.

What's new?

- Dynamax and Z-Moves have been added alongside exclusive G-Max forms and Z-Moves!

- New Pokémon. A decent quantity of new Pokémon, not as many as the last game but a few.

- Overhaul of the Berlin Battle Concert. More details in version 1.0 patch notes.

-  And many more included in version 1.0 patch notes.
